abstract: States and cities have embraced taxable Build America Bonds at what they assume are favorable interest rates. But questions about this multibillion-dollar stimulus program are piling up.
snippet: States and cities have embraced taxable Build America Bonds at what they assume are favorable interest rates. But questions about this multibillion-dollar stimulus program are piling up.
lead_paragraph: They are supposed to help states and cities that are short of cash build roads, schools and bridges.

headline.main: Stimulus Bond Program Has Unforeseen Costs
